imdb.plot outline: Presented by a panel of five women who aren't afraid to call a spade a spade, Straigh Shootin' will be hosted by the Queen of the Kimberley and national icon, Mary G. Each episode will feature Indigenous opinions from around Australia - real people from all walks of life. The panel will give their comments and advice about what the issues are and how to get yourself back on track...without holding back!
imdb.title: Straight Shootin'
